医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现良好的睡眠模式可降低患心脏病的风险持续良好的睡眠模式可以降低患心血管疾病的风险，即使对于具有较高遗传易感性的个体也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Good-sleep-patterns-cut-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Good-sleep-patterns-cut-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c600b83-2dd2-4a3e-b246-4cf93c0ef559 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Good sleep patterns cut heart disease risk, study finds
癌症史会增加高血压患者患心血管疾病的风险研究表明，患有高血压和癌症病史的人患心血管疾病的风险增加，其中接受化疗的人面临的风险最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Cancer-history-raises-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-hypertential-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Cancer-history-raises-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-hypertective-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=794b3631-3daf-41dc-9a34-959282dfbfbe Thu, 25 Apr 2024 19:50:00 -0400 Cancer history raises cardiovascular disease risk in hypertensive patients
饮食对肠道细菌的影响为帕金森病的治疗提供了新线索研究人员发现，饮食显着影响帕金森病患者的肠道微生物组，可能影响疾病进展和症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Diets-impact-on-gut-bacteria-offers-new-clues-in-Parkinsons-disease-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Diets-impact-on-gut-bacteria-offers-new-clues-in-Parkinsons-disease-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46f955bd-4ce3-4398-8279-07e2703b426a Thu, 25 Apr 2024 19:35:00 -0400 Diet's impact on gut bacteria offers new clues in Parkinson's disease management
研究表明患有心脏病的女性治疗不足根据今天在欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 科学大会 ESC 预防心脏病学 2024 上发表的研究，患有心脏病的女性比男性更少接受降胆固醇药物治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Research-reveals-undertreatment-of-women-with-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Research-reveals-undertreatment-of-women-with-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc16ff4-a23e-48ab-846a-d38b2e89dc03 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:21:59 -0400 Research reveals undertreatment of women with heart disease
PhRMA 基金会提供赠款，利用数字健康工具消除健康差异PhRMA 基金会 (PhF) 向南加州大学 DPM、医学博士、哲学博士 David G. Armstrong 和约翰霍普金斯大学医学博士、MHS 的 Nino Isakadze 提供了 50 万美元的资助，以利用数字健康技术 (DHT) 开展研究，以改善患者的健康公平和健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/PhRMA-Foundation-awards-grants-to-fight-health-disparities-with-digital-health-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/PhRMA-Foundation-awards-grants-to-fight-health-disparities-with-digital-health-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31d465dd-94d4-4f13-93ca-fe8a59a511d3 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:16:06 -0400 PhRMA Foundation awards grants to fight health disparities with digital health tools
祖母在缓冲孙辈逆境方面发挥着至关重要的作用芬兰图尔库大学进行的一项研究表明，外祖母的投资可以改善面临生活逆境的孙辈的福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Maternal-grandmothers-play-crucial-role-in-buffering-grandchildrens-adversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Maternal-grandmothers-play-crucial-role-in-buffering-grandchildrens-adversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddcfed57-e068-445a-a93f-ff73e127fc9f Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:12:51 -0400 Maternal grandmothers play crucial role in buffering grandchildren's adversity
单胚胎移植的公共资助降低了体外受精中的多胎妊娠率在引入公费体外受精（IVF）强制选择性单胚胎移植后的时代，IVF的多胎妊娠率显着下降，但诱导排卵和宫内人工授精（OI/IUI）对多胎妊娠的贡献仍需关注根据 ICES 和女王大学的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Public-funding-for-single-embryo-transfer-cuts-multifetal-pregnancy-rates-in-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Public-funding-for-single-embryo-transfer-cuts-multifetal-pregnancy-rates-in-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=978bbfc8-349c-44a7-9bef-ee118f5aea30 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:00:00 -0400 Public funding for single embryo transfer cuts multifetal pregnancy rates in IVF
二价 COVID-19 疫苗可增强免疫力，但需要更新根据《医学病毒学杂志》报道的巴西研究，一种主要的二价 COVID-19 疫苗会诱导产生针对大流行开始时流行的冠状病毒以及 omicron 亚变体的中和抗体，尽管数量较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Bivalent-COVID-19-vaccine-boosts-immunity-but-needs-to-be-updated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Bivalent-COVID-19-vaccine-boosts-immunity-but-needs-to-be-updated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c3c089c-7f23-470f-84c6-e03bc07b3a64 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 12:53:07 -0400 Bivalent COVID-19 vaccine boosts immunity but needs to be updated
机器学习系统为罕见遗传性疾病的诊断带来新希望即使对于经验丰富的遗传学家来说，诊断罕见的孟德尔疾病也是一项劳动密集型任务。贝勒医学院的研究人员正在尝试利用人工智能提高这一过程的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Machine-learning-system-offers-new-hope-for-diagnosis-of-rare-genic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Machine-learning-system-offers-new-hope-for-diagnosis-of-rare-genic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01fee750-589a-4682-98c4-ff6675a0c96f Thu, 25 Apr 2024 12:30:03 -0400 Machine learning system offers new hope for diagnosis of rare genetic disorders
拯救了 1.54 亿人的生命：具有里程碑意义的研究凸显了疫苗接种的力量《柳叶刀》即将发表的一项具有里程碑意义的重大研究表明，在过去 50 年中，全球免疫工作估计挽救了 1.54 亿人的生命，相当于每年每分钟挽救 6 条生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/154-million-lives-saved-Landmark-study-highlights-power-of-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/154-million-lives-saved-Landmark-study-highlights-power-of-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e9d7f13-6644-404d-aaa5-31dd2d6b7827 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 12:23:58 -0400 154 million lives saved: Landmark study highlights power of vaccination
